chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rmri: raft_msg_refinement_interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
glci: ghost_log_correct_interface
lphogli: log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface
tsi: term_sanity_interface
aelsi: allEntries_leader_sublog_interface
glaei: ghost_log_allEntries_interface

Goal:
forall (net : network) (p : packet), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> contiguous_range_exact_lo (fst (pBody p)) 0

Premises:
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
contiguous_range_exact_lo = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (xs : list entry) (lo : nat) => (forall i : nat, lo < i <= maxIndex xs -> exists e : entry, eIndex e = i /\ In e xs) /\ (forall e : entry, In e xs -> lo < eIndex e) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> nat -> Prop Arguments contiguous_range_exact_lo {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope _%nat_scope
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := MRRIR_init : msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | MRRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | MRRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
ghost_log_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (fst (pBody p))
log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (P : list entry -> Prop) (p : packet), msg_log_property P -> In p (nwPackets net) -> P (fst (pBody p)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
ghost_log_entries_match_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (p : packet), In p (nwPackets net) -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) (fst (pBody p)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments ghost_log_entries_match_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
ghost_log_allEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> In e (fst (pBody p)) -> exists t : term, In (t, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net (pSrc p)))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments ghost_log_allEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
ghost_log_entries_match_nw = fun net : network => forall p p' : packet, In p (nwPackets net) -> In p' (nwPackets net) -> entries_match (fst (pBody p)) (fst (pBody p')) : network -> Prop
lifted_entries_contiguous_nw = fun net : network => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> contiguous_range_exact_lo es pli : network -> Prop
entries_contiguous_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> contiguous_range_exact_lo es pli : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_contiguous_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
MRRIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (snd (pBody p)) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = (d, l) -> update_elections_data_net (pDst p) (pSrc p) (snd (pBody p)) (nwState net (pDst p)) = gd -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
msg_log_property = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : list entry -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : Net.name), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (log (snd (nwState net h))) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, (list entry -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments msg_log_property {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t v = d ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
ghost_log_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (l : ghost_msg) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> fst (pBody p) = l ->...-> Prop Arguments ghost_log_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Inductive step_failure (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (params : FailureParams P) : step_relation (list Net.name * network) (Net.name * (input + list output)) := StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d...
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t v = d ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
entries_gt_0_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> eIndex e > 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_gt_0_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_sorted_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> sorted es : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_sorted_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
RRIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = (d, l) -> update_elections_data_net (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = gd -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} ->...-> Prop Arguments msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n

```coq
intros net p Hreach HpIn.
specialize (lphogli net) with (1 := Hreach).
specialize (glci net) with (1 := Hreach).
destruct p as [pSrc pDst pBody].
simpl in *.
unfold contiguous_range_exact_lo.
destruct pBody as [|t n pli plt es ci].
+ simpl in *. intros. exfalso. apply H. apply In_nil.
+ simpl in *.
  specialize (entries_sorted_nw net p t n pli plt es ci) with (1 := Hreach) (2 := HpIn).
  specialize (entries_gt_0_nw net p t n pli plt es ci) with (1 := Hreach) (2 := HpIn).
  intros i Hile.
  destruct (entries_sorted_nw net p t n pli plt es ci) as [Hsorted _].
  apply Hsorted in Hile.
  destruct Hile as [e [HeIndex HeIn]].
  exists e.
  split; auto.
  specialize (entries_gt_0_nw net p t n pli plt es ci e) with (1 := HeIn).
  omega.
Qed.

original: intros net p Hreach HpIn. specialize (lphogli net) with (1 := Hreach). specialize (glci net) with (1 := Hreach). destruct p as [pSrc pDst pBody]. simpl in *. unfold contiguous_range_exact_lo. destruct pBody as [|t n pli plt es ci]. + simpl in *. intros. exfalso. apply H. apply In_nil. + simpl in *. specialize (entries_sorted_nw net p t n pli plt es ci) with (1 := Hreach) (2 := HpIn). specialize (entries_gt_0_nw net p t n pli plt es ci) with (1 := Hreach) (2 := HpIn). intros i Hile. destruct (entries_sorted_nw net p t n pli plt es ci) as [Hsorted _]. apply Hsorted in Hile. destruct Hile as [e [HeIndex HeIn]]. exists e. split; auto. specialize (entries_gt_0_nw net p t n pli plt es ci e) with (1 := HeIn). omega.
